Topic.Title: I WAS WRONG- for today-

Message.Msg: You cant seriously be a trader?? I watch the s&p on charts along with GOOG and many others - It moves in lock-step with S&P. Do an overlay comparision at say BIGCHARTS if you have no access or YHOO what ever. I use my own 3 different brokerages charts . Either way wherever you get charts from do a 1 month or more chart of GOOG vs SPY, you will see they move together, even intraday they do. Today was an anomoly. NKnow go do your assigned homework and come back and admit you learned . Facts are facts. I will post chart if I can

Topic.Title: I WAS WRONG- for today-

Message.Msg: I was wrong big time also. I was certain that GOOG would tank too. However, DJ even commented that GOOG went it's own way. It topped at 910. I had sold 30 905 calls on a spread with buying 30 915 calls . At the end of the day I thought my spread would work out, but it didn't. With 2 days to go, I couldn't risk being exercised, so I cashed in the spread. Of course, my luck being consistent, the spread narrowed considerably just after I got out. GOOG ended flat on the day. Somebody must have been looking FOR me vice AFTER me. Well, there's always tomorrow....
